results.description: A little over two years ago Monaco were a poster club for attacking football and excellent recruitment - so why are they now battling relegation?
results.shortTitle: How Monaco fell from glory to ignominy
results.title: The fall of Monaco: From Champions League semi-finals to brink of relegation

thumbnail.altText: A Monaco players reacts to defeat

results.description: BBC Sport travels to Monte Carlo to meet England Under-21 defender Jonathan Panzo, who left Chelsea for Monaco and has since moved to Cercle Bruges on loan.
results.shortTitle: The England U21 defender who moved to Monaco at 17
results.title: Jonathan Panzo: The England Under-21 defender who moved to Monaco

results.description: Galatasaray sign Colombia striker Radamel Falcao from Monaco as Florin Andone and Mario Lemina join on season-long loans from Brighton and Southampton.
results.shortTitle: Galatasaray sign Falcao from Monaco
results.title: Galatasaray sign Radamel Falcao as Mario Lemina and Florin Andone join on loan

results.description: Leicester City's Algeria striker Islam Slimani joins French side Monaco on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Leicester's Slimani joins Monaco on loan
results.title: Islam Slimani: Monaco sign Leicester City striker on loan

results.description: Memphis Depay scores as Lyon open their Ligue 1 campaign with a 3-0 win at Monaco, who had Cesc Fabregas sent off following a VAR review.
results.shortTitle: Fabregas sees red after VAR as Lyon win
results.title: Monaco 0-3 Lyon: Fabregas red after VAR review; Depay scores

results.description: Everton sign France defender Djibril Sidibe on a season-long loan from Monaco.
results.shortTitle: Everton sign Monaco's Sidibe on loan
results.title: Everton transfers: Djibril Sidibe signs from Monaco

results.description: Reading sign Sheffield Wednesday striker Lucas Joao and Brazil goalkeeper Rafael, and bring in Monaco midfielder Pele on loan.
results.shortTitle: Reading bring in Joao, Pele & Rafael
results.title: Reading sign Lucas Joao from Sheffield Wednesday, keeper Rafael and Monaco's Pele

results.description: Championship side Bristol City sign Han-Noah Massengo from French Ligue 1 side AS Monaco for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City sign Massengo from Monaco
results.title: Han-Noah Massengo: Bristol City sign Monaco midfielder

thumbnail.altText: Han-Noah Massengo in action for Monaco

results.description: Bristol City boss Lee Johnson wants up to five new signings, with a deal for Monaco midfielder Han-Noah Massengo close.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City want up to five signings
results.title: Lee Johnson: Bristol City head coach targets up to five new signings

results.description: Leicester sign Belgium midfielder Youri Tielemans from Monaco on a four-year deal for a reported £40m.
results.shortTitle: Leicester sign Tielemans from Monaco
results.title: Youri Tielemans: Leicester sign Monaco midfielder

results.description: Is 'club legends returning to their former sides as manager' the hot football trend of 2019?
results.shortTitle: Could Lampard follow in the footsteps of Zidane and co?
results.title: Frank Lampard, Jonathan Woodgate & Vincent Kompany: When star players return

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores a hat-trick as Paris St-Germain celebrated their Ligue 1 title success with a win over Monaco on a day of tributes for Notre Dame Cathredral.
results.shortTitle: Champions PSG pay Notre Dame tribute
results.title: PSG win Ligue 1 as Mbappe scores hat-trick; Notre Dame tribute; Neymar returns

results.description: Cesc Fabregas scores his first goal for Monaco as the Ligue 1 strugglers record their first win since Thierry Henry's sacking.
results.shortTitle: Fabregas scores first Monaco goal in win over Toulouse
results.title: Monaco 2-1 Toulouse: Fabregas scores first Monaco goal

thumbnail.altText: Cesc Fabregas applauds the Monaco fans after scoring his first goal for the club against Toulouse in Ligue 1

results.description: Newcastle United break their transfer record to sign Paraguay playmaker Miguel Almiron from MLS side Atlanta United for £20m
results.shortTitle: Newcastle sign Almiron in record deal
results.title: Miguel Almiron: Newcastle United sign playmaker for club record fee of £20m

results.description: Borussia Dortmund midfielder Shinji Kagawa joins Turkish side Besiktas on loan for the rest of the season.
results.shortTitle: Kagawa leaves Dortmund for Besiktas
results.title: European transfers round-up: Shinji Kagawa joins Besiktas

results.description: Leicester have completed a loan move for Monaco midfielder Youri Tielemans, with Adrien Silva moving the other way.
results.shortTitle: Leicester confirm Tielemans loan deal
results.title: Youri Tielemans: Leicester confirm loan signing of Monaco midfielder

results.description: Tottenham winger Georges-Kevin N'Koudou joins Monaco on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Spurs' N'Koudou joins Monaco on loan
results.title: Georges-Kevin N'Koudou: Tottenham winger joins Monaco on loan until end of season

results.description: Nottingham Forest sign striker Leo Bonatini from Wolves and Monaco midfielder Pele on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Forest sign Pele and Bonatini on loan
results.title: Nottingham Forest sign Leo Bonatini from Wolves and Monaco midfielder Pele

results.description: Cardiff City are targeting a deal for Monaco defender Almamy Toure ahead of the 31 January transfer deadline.

results.description: Monaco are beaten by fellow Ligue 1 strugglers Dijon in their first game since sacking boss Thierry Henry.

results.title: Dijon 2-0 Monaco: Strugglers beaten after Henry sacking
